website_summaries.verdict: Early morning and late night riders can feel secure with the impressive safety features this reputable bike offers.
pros: Solar-activated paint glows hours after being in the sun, making it especially visible to cars
Buyers love the sleek, minimalist design of the bike
cons: Some owners claim the paint job is a little sloppy
Problems with shipping seems to be a common issue

customer_reviews.title: Light up your night ride!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely bike. It came with a minor dent but not one I wanted to endure a return in order to fix. It is small and did not chip the paint. The only complain I have is the brake. It is quite dusty as far as brake material goes, and it's braking power is not optimal being the only brake on the bike since I don't ride fixed. As far as the bike, it is beautiful. Classic white by daylight and glowing by night. I love it, except for when I'm trying to sleep and it's lighting up my room, but that's the price of downtown apartment living I suppose. :) great bike!
customer_reviews.author: timothy d.

customer_reviews.title: Great baseline bike
customer_reviews.text: 58cm is incredibly fast for those 195-205 pounds. Well balanced with endless upgrades given your maturity. Great baseline bike. Best part is: their upgrades are cheap. Well made frame. But, the bad: issues with the rims--blown three tubes in 2 months. A bit off center. The mechanic took his time on the second snakebite--and still he deduced it was the rims. So, prepare for upgrades if you want to progress. In the meantime, excellent bike for the price. Reminds me of old skool Specialized. Can't go wrong if you are serious about the sport and want to go long term.
customer_reviews.author: v.p.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this 2 days ago, and I just got it today.
customer_reviews.text: I chose this rating because I love the glow color of bicycle. One of my friend ordered this and it was awesome to ride it in spring day. So I decided to get one for me too. I ordered this last Saturday, and I just got it today. I opened it and I loved it. It was very easy to build it together. The color was so beautiful and it will be perfect time to ride bicycle with this weather. I'm getting ready for the Spring and Summer now. Thank you for making this kinds of bicycle. I appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Jin

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd Pure Fix I've bought since May 2018.
customer_reviews.text: I like how simple and clean your design is. I live in Florida and Ohio, therefore I do not need more than 1 gear because of no real elevation changes. My only complaint was the condition of the box on arrival. However you do such a good job packing the frame and wheels that I was not concerned what the product looked like out of the box. Pure Cycles Rocks!!! Thank you very much; Bob McCreedy
customer_reviews.author: Robert J McCreedy

customer_reviews.title: Solid Fix
customer_reviews.text: This will be my second Pure Fix that I've purchased. I love these bikes but I have a few minor critiques. First.. both bikes that I've bought have had the front wheel tucked behind the crankarm for shipping. This has caused some dents/scratches to one of the spokes on both bikes. Although this is minor.. It bothered me to some degree. Second, my Kilo Glow arrived with some nicks and chips in the paint. Would of loved some Kilo paint so I could of touched them up. Other than that.. I'm very pleased with my purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Chigurh

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this bike
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply, this is an incredible bike. I found it rides much smoother than any other biker I've ever owned. It looks awesome (I've had kids stop me on the street to ask about it), and was easy to assemble. I would definitely recommend this bike if you're looking for a reasonably priced, sweet ass fixie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: The bike came without any problems despite what was said. My grandson enjoys it very much and it's a very ideal gift. The only real downside was the glow in the dark part which we haven't seen to happen yet.If it weren't for advertisement of glow in the drak I would've never bought it. It doesnot glow in the dark at all.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I chose this company because I loved what the company was all about and the products I knew were quality as they were recommended to me. I have tried a bike and other products before and eventually knew it was finally time to invest in my own. I couldn't be anymore pleased with the performance of the bike. The product was shipped out immediately and got here before the weeks end. The shipping box was damaged but the product inside was well guarded against that and not a scratch was on the wrapping around the frame/wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Swollvak1of3

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: I love the sharp, minimalist look of this bike. Also, it was easy to put together. The ride is smooth and it glows in the dark! Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the shipment quality.
customer_reviews.text: My new fixie was shipped in a timely manner and undamaged. Even though the bike had a tiny scratch about 1cm in length, some extra glow paint was included which was I was very pleased with. Assembly was pretty easy as I have some knowledge of the ins and outs of bikes but the Pure Fix company has a video on how to assemble it although if you don't know anything about bikes, you should take it to a bike shop. All in all I'm pleased with the new bike and the color is magnificent in the dark and in the light. Rides like a fixie should.
customer_reviews.author: Jiwon Bae

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: I received a Kilo last week and am thrilled. It was easy to assemble and arrived in great shape. They included a bottle of touch up paint just in case I ding it up. The color is great. It provides a unique glow even in daylight. The ride is smooth. Free wheel is smooth and fixed works just fine. The gear ratio seems to be fine for moderate hills. It is set to provide a good touring speed on normal flats. Looks cool and rides quiet and smooth. Love the simplicity.
customer_reviews.author: Teote

customer_reviews.title: I like my bike and got a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.text: No damage on packaging. I like my bike and got a lot of compliments. The only comment is the siZing for height. The recommended for height from the manual that comes in the bike is different from the options. All in all im happy with my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Jebb

customer_reviews.title: How Radical! It Glows in the Dark!
customer_reviews.text: How many people own a bike that GLOWS IN THE DARK? Yes, I'd say that feature alone of this Zulu Glow White model is worth an extra $70 over the similar model Romeo. I'd also say that the black saddle and grips make more sense than the white ones on the Romeo. I also think that the nameplate looks better in black than red. Otherwise, this is my first "fixie" and I'm still using the freewheel hub but look forward to flipping that rear wheel around someday soon. I also like Pure Fix's informative videos on  and youtube.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I am very impressed with the ride quality of this bike, particularly for the price point. The front brake doesn't inspire a lot of confidence, but hopefully with some additional riding it'll acquire more "bite" on the rim. For an inexpensive get-around-town bike with cultural appeal, there's not much out there that can beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived the way it was described. Very easy to put together. Bike is very sleek and rides smooth. All components are really good quality for the price. Really digging the the glow paint. Sex on wheels basically.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Condor

customer_reviews.title: Noise on chains and lockrings.
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. I've now have it for about a month and I've noticed that there was some noise when I ride it(sometimes I could not stand it). And the problem was fixed after I changed a pair of new lockrings and tight the chains. But I'm not sure wether there would be noise later.

customer_reviews.title: Cool bike, loud breaks
customer_reviews.text: This bike looks and rides great. I rode it for about 2 hours then back at my place it was glowing pretty strong. My only complaint is the breaks are extremely squeeky. I have only taken the bike out twice, so I'm hoping the brakes just need to be broken in, but every time I apply them it is a ear peicing squeek. Still gets 4 stars for the smooth ride.

customer_reviews.title: It really does glow I'm glad I don't live in a place where it's needed ...
customer_reviews.text: It really does glow I'm glad I don't live in a place where it's needed but knowing that it does is awesome. It rides really well, let's hope the paint holds up.

customer_reviews.title: SMOOOOTHHHH

customer_reviews.title: This Bike Is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I used to just do cardio while in the gym.. Not anymore! This bike has got me exploring the outdoors and making exercise an adventure! It rides great and gets many compliments. Its hard to miss this bike, It really stands out. The only complaint I would have is that the brakes don't seem to be as effective as I'd like them to be. I do not seem to stop as quickly as I'd like. But other than that I really enjoy this bike!

customer_reviews.title: Zulu Bike
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Pure Fix Zulu bike. I'm 6' and ordered the 58" bike and am very happy with the fit. The shipping was very fast as always with Amazon prime. Bike arrived in box with no damage. Very easy to assemble with standard tools. I was interested to see how well it glowed and after only 30 mins in the sunlight it was glowing in the shade and visibly glowing like the pictures in a dark room. The components are all generic but that is to be expected with a $360 bike. For the price, I'm very satisfied!

product_meta.title: Pure Fix Glow in the Dark Fixed Gear Single Speed Fixie Bike
product_meta.description:
Get ready to take your night riding to a whole new level on the Pure Fix GLOW in the Dark Fixie Bike from Pure Cycles. The bike's paint is solar-activated; just give your bike an hour of daytime sun for an hour or more of night-time fun. Whether you're a night owl, a raver, or just want to trip out your friends this is the bike for you.

The Pure Fix GLOW marries the elegance of a classic urban geometry frame and straight fork with the toughness of durable, fully Tig-welded high tensile steel construction that's built to last. The bike is kitted out with a Pure Cycles Drome saddle for a nice mix of comfort and style, front alloy dual pivot brakes for quick stopping, custom Pure Cycles x WTB Thickslick 700 x 28C tires for excellent control and contact with the road, and 40mm deep-dish wheels. Weighing from 22 to 25 pounds (depending on size), this lightweight bike is easy to maneuver through city streets.

With the flip-flop hub, you can quickly change from riding in fixed gear mode to freewheel. Riding with the 15T fixed cog gives you an unmatched feeling of connectedness to the bike, the road, and helps you perfect your pedal-stroke. The 16T freewheel gives you the ability to coast and cruise, just like the single-speed you grew up on.

The Pure Fix GLOW bike comes in the following sizes:

 * 43cm/XX-Small: Fits riders 4 feet, 11 inches to 5 feet, 3 inches
 * 47cm/X-Small: Fits riders 5 feet, 2 inches to 5 feet, 5 inches
 * 50cm/Small: Fits riders 5 feet, 4 inches to 5 feet, 8 inches
 * 54cm/Medium: Fits riders 5 feet, 7 inches to 5 feet, 11 inches
 * 58cm/Large: Fits riders 5 feet, 10 inches to 6 feet
 * 61cm/X-Large: Fits riders 6 feet to 6 feet, 2 inches
 * 64cm/XX-Large: Fits riders 6 feet, 2 inches to 6 feet, 6 inches


Easily customizable, the Pure Fix GLOW can be upgraded with different styles of optional handlebars, saddles, water bottle cages, foot straps, and more from Pure Cycles (sold separately).

Shipped 90% assembled, the bike is simple to assemble and maintain, and you can follow the Pure Cycles YouTube channel for instructions and tips. It's backed by a manufacturer's lifetime warranty on the frame and fork, and a manufacturer's 1-year warranty on components.

Built to Live, Ride, and Thrive
Celebrating bicycling for all that it offers, Pure Cycles offers a variety of frame, geometry, and gearing options as well as a cornucopia of compatible accessories, including different styles of handlebars, saddles, water bottle cages, foot straps, and more.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Get ready to take your night riding to a whole new level on the Pure Fix GLOW in the Dark fixie bike. The bike's paint is solar-activated; just give your bike an hour of daytime sun for an hour or more of night-time fun. Whether you're a night owl, a raver, or just want to trip out your friends this is the bike for you. Pure Fix Cycles Fixie bikes start with the simplicity and elegance of an urban geometry frame and straight fork made from durable high tensile steel to give you the ride and the connected feel you want and need from your fixie. A Neco thread-less headset holds Zoom riser handlebars with Oury grips on a Promax stem. The classic Vader saddle gets the job done, without frills and it keeps the weight down. Radius front brakes stop when asked and are easily removed for a purist ride. Wellgo pedals and cages connect you to a Lasco three-piece sealed bearing crank set. The gear ratio is 44:16 with 74.25 gear-Inch using a KMC chain. Hubs are custom Pure Fix Lasered KT Quandos. Tubes and tires are a nod to control and contact with Kenda 700cc x 28. Pressure retention is courtesy of 60mm Presta valves. All this joy comes out with a weight of only 22-24 pounds, depending on size.
feature_bullets: Stylish, lightweight, and fast single-speed road bike finished with solar-activated paint that glows for an hour plus in the dark after an hour of daytime sun exposure
Flexible flip-flop rear hub lets you quickly change from fixed gear for a connected feel for the road to freewheel for coasting and cruising
Durable, fully Tig-welded high tensile steel frame and fork is built to last; front alloy dual pivot brakes for quick stopping
40mm deep-dish wheels with Thickslick 700 x 28C tires for excellent control and contact with the road; drome saddle for a mix of comfort and style
Bike ships 90% assembled; available in seven sizes; backed by manufacturer's warranty on frame and components
